body_html:
There's a section called Parameters and a section called Shape.
http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#conv1d

I would assume Shape would be sufficient to understand things, but if it's not, please let us know what else you'd want to see there so that we can improve the docs.

There's a section called Parameters and a section called Shape.
http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#conv1d

I would assume Shape would be sufficient to understand things, but if it's not, please let us know what else you'd want to see there so that we can improve the docs.
